title: Uri Geller - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/16/19
itunes:title: Uri Geller - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/16/19
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and renowned psychic Uri Geller discuss his work as a remote viewer with the military, a failed attempt at spoon bending using only his mind on the Tonight Show, and the power of telepathy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
